place.name: UPTON
place.gazetteerText: UPTON, a parish in the district and county of Huntingdon; 6 miles NNW of Huntingdon r. station. Post town, Huntingdon. Real property, £1,258. Pop., 152. Houses, 35. The manor belongs to J. M. Heathcote, Esq. The living is a rectory, united with Coppingford, in the diocese of Ely. Value, £180.* Patron, the Duke of Buccleuch. The church is partly early English. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
